plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT.php.Ces équipements ne sont associés à aucun: These equipments are not associated with any Broker and therefore cannot communicate.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT.php.Il ne devrait pas y avoir un seul orphel: There shouldn't be a single orphan: delete them or attach them to a Broker.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT.php.Le temps que le mode Temps Réel doit fon: The time the Real Time mode is to run in seconds [1-3600].
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT.php.Recevoir aussi les payloads qui sont déj: Also receive payloads that have already been retained by the Broker.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT.php.Topics à ne pas remonter lorsque le mode:
Topics not to ignore when Real Time mode is running.
Several topics can be provided by separating them with '|' (pipe).
For example, the HA auto-discovery topic ('homeassistant/#') is often excluded, because it is very verbose.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT.php.Topics de souscription utilisés lorsque:
Subscription topics used when Real Time mode is running on this Broker.
Several topics can be provided by separating them with '|' (pipe).
By default, the subscription topic is '#', therefore all topics, which can be a lot on some systems.

plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Active/Désactive la publication du statu: Enable/Disable MQTT LWT (Last Will and Testament) status publication by jMQTT on the Broker.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Active/Désactive les interactions au tra:
Enables/disables Interaction via MQTT protocol.
For more information, please refer to the documentation.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Adresse IP ou nom de domaine du Broker.<:
Broker's IP address or domain name.
Value if empty, 'localhost' (i.e. the machine hosting Jeedom).
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Autorité de certification attendue pour: Certification Authority expected for the Broker.
Client Certificate expected by the Broker.
This Certificate must be associated with the Private Key, in the field that appears below, if one is supplied the other is mandatory.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Choisir quel protocole attend le Broker:
Choose which protocol Broker expects for communication.
For more information, please refer to the documentation.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Clée Privée du Client permettant de disc:
Private Key used by the client to communicate with the Broker
This Private Key must be associated with the Certificate above, if one is supplied the other is mandatory.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Déposez ici la clé privée du client MQTT: Drag & drop MQTT Private Key of the client here
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Déposez ici le certificat CA du Broker: Drag & drop CA certificate of the Broker here
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Déposez ici le certificat publique du cl: Drag & drop MQTT public Certificate of the client here
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Identifiant avec lequel l’équipement Bro:
Identifier with which the Broker equipment subscribes to MQTT Broker.
It is important that this identifier is ONLY used by jMQTT on this Broker.
Set the Client-Id ONLY if it is actually necessary for you.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Nom d'utilisateur et Mot de passe permet:
Username and Password for Broker connection
These fields are only mandatory if the Broker is configured for them.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Permet d’accéder à toutes les méthodes d:
Allows access to all Json RPC API methods via the MQTT protocol.
For more information, please refer to the documentation.
Network port Broker is listening on.
Value if empty, 1883 in mqtt, 8883 in mqtts, 1884 in ws and 8884 in wss.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Topic d'accès aux interactions de Jeedom:
Topic for Jeedom interactions on this Broker (by default: 'jeedom/interact').
Send the request in text directly to this topic, it will be transmitted to Jeedom interaction engine.
The response will be sent to the '/reply' subtopic (so by default: 'jeedom/interact/reply').
For advanced interactions, it is possible to formulate a complex request on the '/advanced' subtopic.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Topic d'accès à l'API JSON RPC de Jeedom: Topic to access the Jeedom Json RPC API on this Broker (by default: 'jeedom/status').
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Topic de publication du statut (Last Wil: Topic for publishing status (Last Will and Testament) in MQTT on this Broker (by default: 'jeedom/status').
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.URL de la connexion Web Sockets du serve:
URL of the remote server's Web Sockets connection, without initial '/'.
Value if empty, 'mqtt'. Do not edit if you don't know what you're doing.
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Valeur du statut lorsque jMQTT est conne: Status value when jMQTT is connected to this Broker (by default: 'online').
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Valeur du statut lorsque jMQTT est décon: Status value when jMQTT is disconnected from this Broker (by default: 'offline').
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_broker.p.Vérifie la chaîne d'approbation du certi: Checks the approval chain of the certificate presented by the Broker and that its subject matches the Broker's IP/Domain Name.

plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_eqpt.php.Commande information de Batterie: Information (boolean/integer) command regarding battery level of the equipment
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_eqpt.php.Commande information de disponibilité: Information (boolean) command regarding availability of the equipment
plugins/jMQTT/desktop/php/jMQTT_eqpt.php.Doit être indiqué sous la forme : Secteu: Must be indicated in the form: Mains, 1xCR123A, 3xAA...

plugins/jMQTT/plugin_info/configuration..Ces boutons permettent de gérer l'état d: These buttons manage the status of Mosquitto as a local service on this Jeedom system.
plugins/jMQTT/plugin_info/configuration..Ces boutons permettent de gérer l'instal: These buttons are used to manage the installation of Mosquitto as a local service on this Jeedom system.
plugins/jMQTT/plugin_info/configuration..Démarre (ou redémarre) le service Mosqui: Starts (or restarts) the local Mosquitto service.
plugins/jMQTT/plugin_info/configuration..Edition du fichier de configuration jMQT: Edit the jMQTT.conf configuration file for the local Mosquitto service.
plugins/jMQTT/plugin_info/configuration..Sauvegarder les équipements et la config: Backing up jMQTT equipment and configuration
plugins/jMQTT/plugin_info/configuration..Si Jeedom tourne en Docker, des problème:
If Jeedom runs in Docker it can be difficult to detect callback url, as Jeedom internal port (used outside the container) may be different than real Apache listening port (inside the container).
In this case only, it may be necessary to customize this url, because it cannot be detected automatically by jMQTT.
Only enable this field and edit the value if you know what you're doing!
plugins/jMQTT/plugin_info/configuration..Si Mosquitto est installé en local, jMQT: If Mosquitto is installed locally, jMQTT tries to detect by which plugin.
If Mosquitto is installed locally, jMQTT displays the service status (systemd) here.
plugins/jMQTT/plugin_info/configuration..Supprime complètement Mosquitto du systè: Completely delete Mosquitto from the system, for example if you want to stop using Mosquitto locally, or reinstall it with another plugin.
plugins/jMQTT/plugin_info/configuration..Supprime la configuration actuelle de Mo:
Deletes the current Mosquitto configuration and resets it to jMQTT defaults.
This option is particularly useful if another plugin has already installed Mosquitto and you want jMQTT to replace it.
